resources.string:
This is a sample application written with DevbricksX library. It illustrates how to use the library to compose a notebook app in the most efficient way.

It includes a set of functions that a notebook app should have, including adding, removing, grouping, etc. The notes are store persistently in you local storage.

If you have any problem, please feel free to contact me:

			dailystudio2010@gmail.com
